resources.string: Welcome to the Alaska Quiz! I grew up in Alaska. When I moved to the East Coast of the United States, I got asked some very interesting questions about my home state. Following are some of those real questions with the correct answers.
Alaska is part of which country?"
True of False: Most Alaskans have electricity?
True of False: Most Alaskans have indoor plumbing?
True of False: The main mode of transportation is dog sledding?
True of False: It snows all year long?
These questions are just some trivia about the "last frontier" so that I can experiment with other input types:
How many lakes are there in Alaska over 20 acres in size (Guess to within 100K)?
Which state in the United States is larger than Alaska?
Which is the Alaskan State Bird:
